title: Blade
synopsis: The story revolves around Blade, a "Daywalker" vampire hunter who was born with vampire and human blood after a vampire attacked his mother. While visiting Japan on a mission, Blade tracks down Deacon Frost, the vampire who killed his mother. Blade confronts "Existence," a mysterious organization composed of vampires modified by Frost.
voices: ['Minagawa, Junko', 'Sakamoto, Maaya', 'Koyama, Rikiya', 'Hagiwara, Masato', 'Ueda, Yuuji', 'Touchi, Hiroki', 'Fukuda, Kenji', 'Neya, Michiko', 'Ohara, Sayaka', 'Yoshino, Hiroyuki']
